title: 3 and Out - Another Urban Head Scratcher; Rookie Mini Camp Goals; Najee Harris Comments; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Another Urban Head Scratcher; Rookie Mini Camp Goals; Najee Harris Comments; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John explains why Urban Meyer's decision to play Travis Etienne at wide receiver is just the latest in a series of early head scratchers to start his NFL career, the bare minimum teams are looking for in rookie mini camp, and why Najee Harris' comments about having more free time in the NFL than Alabama is a problem that many rookies can't handle. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
